column1: In  the  speech,  “  STARE  DECISIS  By  Honorable  Edward  D.  Re  Chief  Judge,
United States Customs Court6”, it was said,
“Of  course,  the  issues  raised  in  a  case  stem  from  the  facts  presented.
The  facts  of  the  case,  therefore,  are  of  the  utmost  importance.

Latin maxim, ex facto oritur jus
ex facto oritur jus, tells us that the law arises out of the
facts. Of particular relevance are the following observations by Professor
